creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: group of standing men wearing powdered wigs, long coats and knickers; draped figure in clouds with shield, wearing a feathered helmet, accompanied by three putti, one with a horn and tambourine (?)
marks:
Inscription

URC, in the plate: [14.]; below ima
title: Plate IV from "Nella Venuta in Roma di Madama LeComte e dei Signori Watelet e Copette"
